item.title: 3D Rotation in Python with quaternions
item.description: Today, I wanted to share a bit of code that you can use to rotate any 3D vector using Python. If you want to read a bit about how the code works, and why quaternions are useful, keep reading. If you are only interested in the code, I have it in full on my GitHub Quickly, what is a quaternion? A quaternion is an extension of the complex numbers into 4 dimensions.
